My lifelong friend calls me that her great - nephew is back in the hospital for serious problems relating to his Cystic Fibrosis .
Craig is on so many meds , has kidney stones , has to be patted on the back and use nebulizers repeatedly .
His mother oversees his care while his three younger siblings worry about him .
